document.full_text: global airlines cut their 2011 profit forecast by more than half to $4 billion on monday as high oil prices and turmoil in japan, north africa and the middle east weigh on the industry's recovery.
document.title: airline profits to tumble in 2011 on fuel, global
lines_and_colors: global airlines cut their 2011 profit forecast by more than half to $4 billion on monday as high oil prices and turmoil in japan, north africa and the middle east weigh on the industry's recovery.
